description: The NASM Exam Prep is Upward Mobility’s focused exam preparation Palm webOS app for NASM’s Certified Personal Trainer Certification Exam. This module contains a targeted curriculum of 400 useful questions dealing with the successful knowledge required for entry-level Certified Personal Trainers.  || All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  ||  On a basic level, the NASM Exam Prep identifies and assesses whether a prospective Certified Personal Trainer has the knowledge and skills necessary to perform client assessments and to create safe, highly-effective, and individualized plans for exercise programs based upon the best available science and clinical evidence.  *  Additionally, the exam identifies a core base of knowledge required of Certified Personal Trainers, including: assessment, exercise technique, exercise program design, nutrition, administration and client relations, professional practice and responsibilities, and questions based on relevant scientific research.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
